name: Ice Borer
description: The Ice Borer will drill super-cooled ice deposits when supplied with biofuel from a Biofuel Can / MXC Fuel Canister . Super-cooled ice deposits can only be found on frozen lakes and rivers in the Arctic regions of Prometheus (Biomes: Glacial Cascade or Alpine Steppe - a map of Prometheus biomes can be found here .). The Ice Borer has 5 slots and will last 2 hours and 5 minutes on a full Biofuel Can .
